title: Afterglow
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Deli/cafe and juice bar serving vegan food with the exception of honey in some items and/or as an add-on. Plenty of raw options including crackers, nut cheeses, salads, pasta and cakes. Also has cream soups and quinoa and rice dishes and a variety of cold-pressed juices. Deals only with artisan producers. Last food order 9:15pm.
